original_text:
Joker Riches 2
La vita di corte non doveva essere per niente facile, con il re e la regina costantemente impegnati a mandare avanti regni che si estendevano a perdita d’occhio, sfamare il popolo, difendersi dagli attacchi dei nemici e studiare strategie di guerra per conquistare nuove terre. Per fortuna c’erano i buffoni di corte ad allietare le ore serali dei regnanti, tra scherzi, prese in giro e spettacoli comici! E proprio sul Joker è incentrata questa slot prodotta dalla High 5 Games, con una grafica non particolarmente elaborata ma con un gameplay di sicuro interesse per la presenza di un gioco Bonus che promette di far vincere dei premi di tutto rispetto. Partiamo descrivendo l’ambientazione: sullo sfondo troviamo il castello arroccato su un rilievo, la griglia di gioco invece è incorniciata da due stendardi con quello di sinistra più largo in quanto destinato ad accogliere i simboli Wild che provvederemo a descrivere più avanti. Nella parte bassa viene indicato il saldo, le vincite e il valore della puntata, sulla destra troviamo il tasto per la rotazione manuale dei rulli e quello per l’Autoplay. La musica cavalleresca viene intervallata dallo squillo di trombe e cori di giubilo a seguito delle vincite più importanti, in corrispondenza delle quali inoltre lo schermo viene inondato di monete d’oro.
Caratteristiche principali della slot machine
La griglia di gioco ha una struttura molto tradizionale con cinque rulli e tre righe, con il quinto rullo incorniciato d’oro perché è su questo che appariranno i simboli Wild. Le linee di pagamento sono fisse, 20 per l’esattezza,  sulle quali è possibile puntare da un minimo di 1 credito per linea sino a un massimo di 1.000 crediti. Dal tasto Autoplay è possibile impostare da 10 sino a 100 giri automatici e aggiungere dei limiti di perdita o di vincita oltre i quali la funzione automatica verrà fermata. La volatilità è alta e l’RTP si attesta su un ottimo 96%.
Simboli e funzionalità di Jokers Riches 2
I simboli base sono nove, suddivisi in base al valore dal più basso al più alto. All’ultimo gradino troviamo le carte da gioco J, K, Q, seguite dai tre Joker di colore verde, rosso e viola, tutti con lo stesso valore. Infine, troviamo il principe, la regina e il re che sono i simboli che assicurano le vincite più alte. Il simbolo Wild è rappresentato dal Joker con la scritta Wild sul colletto, ma per renderlo attivo è necessario che sia a sua volta attivata la funzione Lasting Activated Wilds: sul quinto rullo appaiono uno o più bastoni dello stesso colore dei Joker e andranno ad occupare uno, due o tre posti sulla coccarda alla sinistra della griglia di gioco. Nei tre giri successivi ogni volta che apparirà il simbolo del Joker dello stesso colore del bastone, questo diventerà il Jolly e sostituirà tutti i simboli eccetto lo Scatter.
Lo Scatter è il simbolo delle picche con la scritta Bonus. Se ne compaiono tre la griglia si sposta all’interno del castello e si ha diritto a ben sette giocate gratuite durante le quali tutti i Joker diventano automaticamente Wild.

raw_translation.response:
Joker Riches 2

Life at court was not easy, with the king and queen constantly busy running kingdoms that stretched as far as the eye could see, feeding the people, defending against enemy attacks, and studying war strategies to conquer new lands. Luckily, court jesters were there to entertain the rulers during their evening hours, with jokes, teasing, and comedic performances! And it is exactly on the Joker that this slot machine produced by High 5 Games is focused, with a not particularly elaborate graphics but a gameplay of sure interest thanks to the presence of a Bonus game that promises to win substantial prizes. Let's start by describing the setting: in the background, we find the castle perched on a hill, while the game grid is framed by two banners with the left one larger to accommodate the Wild symbols that we will describe later. In the lower part, the balance, winnings, and bet value are indicated, on the right we find the button for manual rotation of the reels and the one for Autoplay. The cavalier music is interspersed with the sound of trumpets and jubilant choirs following the most important wins, which also flood the screen with gold coins.

Main features of the slot machine

The game grid has a very traditional structure with five reels and three rows, with the fifth reel framed in gold because this is where the Wild symbols will appear. The paylines are fixed, 20 to be exact, on which you can bet from a minimum of 1 credit per line up to a maximum of 1,000 credits. From the Autoplay button, it is possible to set from 10 to 100 automatic spins and add loss or win limits beyond which the automatic function will be stopped. The volatility is high and the RTP stands at an excellent 96%.

Symbols and functionalities of Jokers Riches 2

There are nine basic symbols, divided in value from the lowest to the highest. At the bottom step, we find the playing cards J, K, Q, followed by the three Jokers in green, red, and purple, all of the same value. Finally, we find the prince, the queen, and the king, which are the symbols that ensure the highest winnings. The Wild symbol is represented by the Joker with the word Wild on the collar, but to activate it, the Lasting Activated Wilds feature must also be activated: on the fifth reel, one or more sticks of the same color as the Joker appear and will occupy one, two, or three places on the rosette to the left of the game grid. In the next three spins, each time the Joker symbol of the same color as the stick appears, it will become the Joker and replace all symbols except the Scatter.

The Scatter is the symbol of spades with the Bonus inscription. If three appear, the grid moves inside the castle and you are entitled to seven free spins during which all Jokers become automatically Wild.

message.content:
Joker Riches 2, the life of the court was not easy at all, with the king and queen constantly busy running kingdoms that stretched as far as the eye could see, feeding the people, defending against enemy attacks, and strategizing for conquering new lands. Fortunately, court jesters were there to entertain the rulers in the evening hours with jokes, pranks, and comic shows! This High 5 Games slot game focuses on the Joker, with simple graphics, but an intriguing gameplay that includes a bonus game promising sizable prizes. 

Let's start with the setting: the background has a castle perched on a hill, and the game grid is framed by two banners, with the left one wider, intended to accommodate the Wild symbols we'll describe shortly. In the lower part, the balance, winnings, and bet values are displayed, and on the right, there are buttons for manual reel rotation and Autoplay. The knightly music is interspersed with trumpets' blaring and cheers following significant wins. Plus, the screen is flooded with gold coins at that time.

Jokers Riches 2's main features include a game grid with a classic structure of five reels and three rows, with the fifth one framed in gold as Wild symbols appear on it. There are 20 fixed pay lines, where players can wager from 1 credit per line up to a maximum of 1,000 credits. Via Autoplay, players can set between 10 to 100 automatic spins and add loss or win limits, beyond which the automatic function stops. The game's volatility is high, and the RTP stands at an excellent 96%.

The base symbols are nine, with values ranked from lowest to highest. On the bottom steps, we have the playing card symbols J, K, Q, followed by the three Joker symbols in green, red, and purple, all with the same value. Finally, we have the prince, queen, and king symbols, which ensure the highest wins. The Wild symbol is represented by a Joker with "Wild" written on the collar, and to activate it, the Lasting Activated Wilds feature must be activated too. One or more sticks of the same color as the Joker appear on the fifth reel and occupy one, two, or three places on the left side banner of the game grid. In the next three spins, every time the Joker symbol of the same color as the stick appears, it will become Wild and replace all symbols except the Scatter.

The Scatter is the Spades symbol with the word Bonus. If three of them appear, the grid moves inside the castle, and the player is entitled to seven free spins during which all Jokers automatically become Wild.

response.headline: Gameplay mechanics and bonuses
response.content: Joker Riches 2 is a traditional slot machine with five reels and three rows with fixed paylines of 20. The game offers a betting range from a minimum of 1 credit to a maximum of 1,000 credits per line. You can set up to 100 automatic spins from the Autoplay button with loss and win limits. The game has high volatility and an RTP of 96%. The Lasting Activated Wilds feature, which activates by landing Wilds, occurs on the fifth reel with one or multiple sticks of the same color occupying space on the rosette to the left of the game grid. This feature activates the Wild symbol represented by the Joker with the word “Wild” on the collar. It replaces all symbols except the Scatter.

response.headline: Graphics and Design
response.content: Joker Riches 2 offers a simple design and graphics with the castle on a hill as the background and two banners framing the game grid. The Wilds occupy space on the left banner, while the lower part of the interface shows balance, winnings, and bet values. The game offers a cavalier musical background with sounds of trumpets and choirs on significant wins, accompanied by gold coins.

response.headline: Volatility and RTP
response.content: The game has high volatility and an RTP of 96%, making it a profitable slot to consider playing.

response.headline: Paylines and symbol hierarchy
response.content: The game features nine basic symbols, divided into value from lowest to highest. The basic symbols include playing cards J, K, Q, three Jokers in different colors, and the prince, queen, and king symbols that provide the highest winnings. response.headline: Wilds, Scatters, and Bonus features

The Scatter symbol is the spades symbol with the Bonus inscription, and if three appear, the grid relocates inside the castle, and players receive seven free spins during which all Jokers become Wild.

review_with_topics.prompt:
Below is a review for the slot game "Joker Riches 2".

Please, rewrite the review in a neutral tone of voice. Write subsections covering only the following topics:

Gameplay mechanics and bonuses
Graphics and design
Volatility and RTP
Paylines and symbol hierarchy
Wilds, Scatters, and Bonus features

- The review must be very detailed
- No FAQ
- No Notes
- Respond with a JSON array, one item per topic (use the keys "headline" and "content")

Life at court was not easy, with the king and queen constantly busy running kingdoms that stretched as far as the eye could see, feeding the people, defending against enemy attacks, and studying war strategies to conquer new lands. Luckily, court jesters were there to entertain the rulers during their evening hours, with jokes, teasing, and comedic performances! And it is exactly on the Joker that this slot machine produced by High 5 Games is focused, with a not particularly elaborate graphics but a gameplay of sure interest thanks to the presence of a Bonus game that promises to win substantial prizes. Let's start by describing the setting: in the background, we find the castle perched on a hill, while the game grid is framed by two banners with the left one larger to accommodate the Wild symbols that we will describe later. In the lower part, the balance, winnings, and bet value are indicated, on the right we find the button for manual rotation of the reels and the one for Autoplay. The cavalier music is interspersed with the sound of trumpets and jubilant choirs following the most important wins, which also flood the screen with gold coins.

Main features of the slot machine

The game grid has a very traditional structure with five reels and three rows, with the fifth reel framed in gold because this is where the Wild symbols will appear. The paylines are fixed, 20 to be exact, on which you can bet from a minimum of 1 credit per line up to a maximum of 1,000 credits. From the Autoplay button, it is possible to set from 10 to 100 automatic spins and add loss or win limits beyond which the automatic function will be stopped. The volatility is high and the RTP stands at an excellent 96%.

Symbols and functionalities of Jokers Riches 2

There are nine basic symbols, divided in value from the lowest to the highest. At the bottom step, we find the playing cards J, K, Q, followed by the three Jokers in green, red, and purple, all of the same value. Finally, we find the prince, the queen, and the king, which are the symbols that ensure the highest winnings. The Wild symbol is represented by the Joker with the word Wild on the collar, but to activate it, the Lasting Activated Wilds feature must also be activated: on the fifth reel, one or more sticks of the same color as the Joker appear and will occupy one, two, or three places on the rosette to the left of the game grid. In the next three spins, each time the Joker symbol of the same color as the stick appears, it will become the Joker and replace all symbols except the Scatter.

The Scatter is the symbol of spades with the Bonus inscription. If three appear, the grid moves inside the castle and you are entitled to seven free spins during which all Jokers become automatically Wild.

response.headline: Get Your Laughs with Joker Riches 2 Gameplay Mechanics and Bonuses
response.content:
Looking for a classic slot game experience with a jolt of zaniness? Try Joker Riches 2! This traditional slot machine boasts 5 reels and 3 rows, with fixed paylines of 20 (which is more than you can say for some of your exes). It's like having your own personal wild card - just don't let it go to your head.

The game features nine basic symbols, divided into value from lowest to highest. The Wild symbol is represented by the Joker with the word “Wild” on the collar and appears on the fifth reel. The Scatter symbol is the spades symbol with the Bonus inscription.

The Wild symbol is represented by a Joker with the word Wild, and the Lasting Activated Wilds feature offers extra opportunities to create winning combinations. The Scatter is the symbol of spades with the Bonus inscription and can activate the Bonus feature, rewarding players with seven free spins.

Graphics and Design

The graphics of Joker Riches 2 are straightforward and do not feature any particularly elaborate design. The game grid is framed by two banners, the left one being larger to accommodate the Wild symbols. The backdrop depicts a castle perched on a hill, while sounds of trumpets and choirs add to the excitement of the game's biggest wins. Overall, while the design is not overly flashy, it is functional and offers excellent gameplay, with the focus on winning big.

Wild and Scatter Symbols

The Wild symbol in Joker Riches 2 is represented by a Joker with the word Wild. To activate it, the Lasting Activated Wilds feature must also be activated. The Wild can replace all symbols except the Scatter. The Scatter is the symbol of spades with the Bonus inscription. If three Scatters appear, the game will move inside the castle, and players will be rewarded with seven free spins during which time all Jokers become automatically Wild, increasing the chances of payouts.

Below is a review of the game "Joker Riches 2".

Please provide an FAQ:

- 8 questions
- Use simple language and provide practical takeaways.
- Respond with a JSON!
- Use the key "faq" and an array with the keys "question" and "answer". 

Review: Joker Riches 2

Life at court was not easy, with the king and queen constantly busy running kingdoms that stretched as far as the eye could see, feeding the people, defending against enemy attacks, and studying war strategies to conquer new lands. Luckily, court jesters were there to entertain the rulers during their evening hours, with jokes, teasing, and comedic performances! And it is exactly on the Joker that this slot machine produced by High 5 Games is focused, with a not particularly elaborate graphics but a gameplay of sure interest thanks to the presence of a Bonus game that promises to win substantial prizes. Let's start by describing the setting: in the background, we find the castle perched on a hill, while the game grid is framed by two banners with the left one larger to accommodate the Wild symbols that we will describe later. In the lower part, the balance, winnings, and bet value are indicated, on the right we find the button for manual rotation of the reels and the one for Autoplay. The cavalier music is interspersed with the sound of trumpets and jubilant choirs following the most important wins, which also flood the screen with gold coins.

Main features of the slot machine

The game grid has a very traditional structure with five reels and three rows, with the fifth reel framed in gold because this is where the Wild symbols will appear. The paylines are fixed, 20 to be exact, on which you can bet from a minimum of 1 credit per line up to a maximum of 1,000 credits. From the Autoplay button, it is possible to set from 10 to 100 automatic spins and add loss or win limits beyond which the automatic function will be stopped. The volatility is high and the RTP stands at an excellent 96%.

Symbols and functionalities of Jokers Riches 2

There are nine basic symbols, divided in value from the lowest to the highest. At the bottom step, we find the playing cards J, K, Q, followed by the three Jokers in green, red, and purple, all of the same value. Finally, we find the prince, the queen, and the king, which are the symbols that ensure the highest winnings. The Wild symbol is represented by the Joker with the word Wild on the collar, but to activate it, the Lasting Activated Wilds feature must also be activated: on the fifth reel, one or more sticks of the same color as the Joker appear and will occupy one, two, or three places on the rosette to the left of the game grid. In the next three spins, each time the Joker symbol of the same color as the stick appears, it will become the Joker and replace all symbols except the Scatter.

The Scatter is the symbol of spades with the Bonus inscription. If three appear, the grid moves inside the castle and you are entitled to seven free spins during which all Jokers become automatically Wild.
